data.title: The Nun (2018)
data.summary: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

data.title: The Predator (2018)
data.summary: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled science teacher can prevent the end of the human race.

data.title: Halloween (2018)
data.summary: Laurie Strode comes to her final confrontation with Michael Myers, the masked figure who has haunted her since she narrowly escaped his killing spree on Halloween night four decades ago.

data.title: The Meg (2018)
data.summary: After escaping an attack by what he claims was a 70-foot shark, Jonas Taylor must confront his fears to save those trapped in a sunken submersible.

data.title: Hereditary (2018)
data.summary: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences, and begin to unravel dark secrets.

data.title: Mandy (I) (2018)
data.summary: Mandy is set in the primal wilderness of 1983 where Red Miller, a broken and haunted man hunts an unhinged religious sect who slaughtered the love of his life.

data.title: Venom (2018)
data.summary: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego "Venom" to save his life.

data.title: Upgrade (2018)
data.summary: Set in the near-future, technology controls nearly all aspects of life. But when Grey, a self-identified technophobe, has his world turned upside down, his only hope for revenge is an experimental computer chip implant called Stem.

data.title: It: Chapter Two (2019)
data.summary: 27 years later, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

data.title: A Quiet Place (2018)
data.summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

data.title: The Conjuring (2013)
data.summary: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

data.title: The Conjuring 2 (2016)
data.summary: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

data.title: It (I) (2017)
data.summary: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shapeshifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

data.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
data.summary: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

data.title: Slice (2018)
data.summary: When a pizza delivery driver is murdered on the job, the city searches for someone to blame: ghosts? drug dealers? a disgraced werewolf?

data.title: Slender Man (2018)
data.summary: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

data.title: Summer of 84 (2018)
data.summary: After suspecting that their police officer neighbor is a serial killer, a group of teenage friends spend their summer spying on him and gathering evidence, but as they get closer to discovering the truth, things get dangerous.

data.title: Terrifier (2017)
data.summary: A maniacal clown named Art terrorizes three young women on Halloween night and everyone else who stands in his way.

data.title: Mara (2018)
data.summary: Criminal psychologist Kate Fuller is assigned to the murder of a man who has seemingly been strangled in his sleep by his wife and the only witness is their eight-year-old daughter, Sophie....                See full summary »

data.title: Suspiria (2018)
data.summary: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.

data.title: Assassination Nation (2018)
data.summary: This is a thousand percent a true story about how the quiet, all-American town of Salem absolutely lost its mind.

data.title: Mother! (2017)
data.summary: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

data.title: The New Mutants (2019)
data.summary: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

data.title: Halloween (1978)
data.summary: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

data.title: Annabelle: Creation (2017)
data.summary: 12 years after the tragic death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they soon become the target of the dollmaker's possessed creation, Annabelle.

data.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
data.summary: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

data.title: Annihilation (2018)
data.summary: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

data.title: Get Out (I) (2017)
data.summary: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

data.title: Predator 2 (1990)
data.summary: Amidst a territorial gang war in 1997, a sophisticated alien hunter stalks the citizens of Los Angeles and the only man between him and his prey is veteran L.A.P.D. officer, Lieutenant Mike Harrigan.

data.title: Split (IX) (2016)
data.summary: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

data.title: Patient Zero (I) (2018)
data.summary: After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure.

data.title: Unfriended: Dark Web (2018)
data.summary: A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him, but will also do anything to get it back.

data.title: Hell Fest (2018)
data.summary: A masked serial killer turns a horror themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.

data.title: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale (2015)
data.summary: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

data.title: Truth or Dare (I) (2018)
data.summary: A harmless game of Truth or Dare among friends turns deadly when someone -- or something -- begins to punish those who tell a lie or refuse the dare.

data.title: Overlord (2018)
data.summary: The story of two American soldiers behind enemy lines on D Day.

data.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019)
data.summary: The next chapter in Warner Bros. Pictures' and Legendary Pictures' cinematic MonsterVerse: an epic action adventure that pits Godzilla against some of the most popular monsters in pop culture history.

data.title: Revenge (II) (2017)
data.summary: Never take your mistress on an annual guys' getaway, especially one devoted to hunting - a violent lesson for three wealthy married men.

data.title: Stree (2018)
data.summary: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

data.title: Doom (2005)
data.summary: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

data.title: Annabelle (I) (2014)
data.summary: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.

data.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)
data.summary: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

data.title: Alien: Covenant (2017)
data.summary: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

data.title: Ghost Stories (I) (2017)
data.summary: Skeptical professor Phillip Goodman embarks on a trip to the terrifying after finding a file with details of three unexplained cases of apparitions.

data.title: The Shining (1980)
data.summary: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

data.title: The First Purge (2018)
data.summary: America's third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given anyone who does.

data.title: The Little Stranger (2018)
data.summary: After a doctor is called to visit a crumbling manor, strange things begin to occur.

data.title: Alien (1979)
data.summary: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

data.title: Climax (2018)
data.summary: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

data.title: Unsane (2018)
data.summary: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear--but is it real or a product of her delusion?

data.title: The Lodgers (2017)
data.summary: 1920, rural Ireland. Anglo Irish twins Rachel and Edward share a strange existence in their crumbling family estate. Each night, the property becomes the domain of a sinister presence (The ...                See full summary »

data.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem (2007)
data.summary: Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

data.title: Delirium (I) (2018)
data.summary: A man recently released from a mental institute inherits a mansion after his wealthy parents die. After a series of disturbing events, he comes to believe it is haunted.

data.title: Halloween (2007)
data.summary: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

data.title: Stephanie (I) (2017)
data.summary: After a mysterious global crisis, a young girl is left alone to hide from a malevolent power that stalks her home. Her parents eventually return and the struggle begins to save their daughter.

data.title: Bad Samaritan (2018)
data.summary: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

data.title: AVP: Alien vs. Predator (2004)
data.summary: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

data.title: Office Uprising (2018)
data.summary: An employee at a weapons factory discovers that an energy drink turns his co-workers into zombies

data.title: The Conjuring 3
data.summary: Add a Plot

data.title: Blood Fest (2018)
data.summary: Fans flock to a festival celebrating the most iconic horror movies, only to discover that the charismatic showman behind the event has a diabolical agenda. As festival attendees start dying...                See full summary »

data.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween (2018)
data.summary: Halloween comes to life in a comedy adventure based on R.L. Stine's 400-million-selling series of books.

data.title: The House That Jack Built (2018)
data.summary: The story follows Jack, a highly intelligent serial killer over the course of 12 years and depicts the murders that truly develop Jack as a serial killer.

data.title: Salò o le 120 giornate di Sodoma (1975)
data.summary: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to one hundred and twenty days of physical, mental and sexual torture.

data.title: Insidious: The Last Key (2018)
data.summary: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.

data.title: Psycho (1960)
data.summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

data.title: Candyman (1992)
data.summary: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

data.title: Boarding School (2018)
data.summary: A young boy becomes fascinated with the persona of his dead grandmother and is sent to an isolated boarding school for misfits run by a mysterious headmaster and his wife.

data.title: The Purge (I) (2013)
data.summary: A wealthy family are held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

data.title: Don't Breathe (2016)
data.summary: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

data.title: The Endless (I) (2017)
data.summary: Two brothers return to the cult they fled from years ago to discover that the group's beliefs may be more sane than they once thought.

data.title: World War Z (2013)
data.summary: Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

data.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor (2008)
data.summary: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

data.title: Jigsaw (I) (2017)
data.summary: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

data.title: Insidious (I) (2010)
data.summary: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

data.title: Winchester (2018)
data.summary: Ensconced in her sprawling California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.

data.title: Dracula (1992)
data.summary: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

data.title: Suspiria (1977)
data.summary: An American newcomer to a prestigious German ballet academy comes to realize that the school is a front for something sinister amid a series of grisly murders.

data.title: Scream (1996)
data.summary: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

data.title: The Ritual (I) (2017)
data.summary: A group of college friends reunite for a trip to the forest, but encounter a menacing presence in the woods that's stalking them.

data.title: The Exorcist (1973)
data.summary: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

data.title: The Purge: Election Year (2016)
data.summary: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

data.title: Bone Tomahawk (2015)
data.summary: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

data.title: It Follows (2014)
data.summary: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

data.title: Gerald's Game (2017)
data.summary: While trying to spice up their marriage in their remote lake house, Jessie must fight to survive when her husband dies unexpectedly, leaving her handcuffed to their bed frame.

data.title: Down a Dark Hall (2018)
data.summary: Kit Gordy, a new student at the exclusive Blackwood Boarding School, confronts the institution's supernatural occurrences and dark powers of its headmistress.

data.title: The Cabin in the Woods (2012)
data.summary: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

data.title: Trench 11 (2017)
data.summary: In the final days of WWI, an allied army unit led by a shell-shocked soldier is sent to investigate a mysterious abandoned German facility located deep underground. What they find is fate worse than death.

data.title: The Strangers: Prey at Night (2018)
data.summary: A family of four staying at a secluded mobile home park for the night are stalked and then hunted by three masked psychopaths.

data.title: Life (I) (2017)
data.summary: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form that caused extinction on Mars and now threatens all life on Earth.

data.title: Happy Death Day (2017)
data.summary: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killer's identity.

data.title: Tusk (2014)
data.summary: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

data.title: Verónica (I) (2017)
data.summary: Madrid, 1991. A teen girl finds herself besieged by an evil supernatural force after she played Ouija with two classmates.

data.title: Doom (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown.

data.title: The Thing (1982)
data.summary: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

data.title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles (1994)
data.summary: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

data.title: My Friend Dahmer (2017)
data.summary: A young Jeffrey Dahmer struggles to belong in high school.

data.title: The Cloverfield Paradox (2018)
data.summary: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

data.title: Carrie (1976)
data.summary: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

data.title: Ghostland (2018)
data.summary: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

data.title: The Bad Seed (1956)
data.summary: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight year-old daughter is a heartless killer.
